General.Name: Samil Enterprise Co. Ltd
General.Description: Samil Enterprise Co., Ltd., a general construction company, provides architecture and civil engineering services in South Korea. The company engages in the schools, hospitals, factories, buildings, dormitories, military construction, etc. It also undertakes civil order construction and engineering works for the public and private order construction, such as road, port, bridge, and site construction. In addition, the company offers rental and leasing services. Samil Enterprise Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1958 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
